## Methods

We included `r nrow(data_clean)` participants from NHANES 2009-2012. The sample included `r sum(data_clean$Gender == "female")` females and `r sum(data_clean$Gender == "male")` males. The mean age was `r round(mean(data_clean$Age), 1)` years.
